title: 'Work from home' tips from Astronauts, Submariners - ​Stave off cabin fever - Economic Times
description: 'Work from home' tips from Astronauts, Submariners - ​Stave off cabin fever Economic Times Coronavirus Outbreak: Five astronauts give us their best tips on enjoying life in self-isolation Firstpost Scientists share tips and tricks to stay in quarantine during…
content:
Sailor Isabelle Autissier was the first woman to circumnavigate the globe alone. This involved a lot of time to herself.But she said she never felt lonely because "I chose to be alone."
For people stuck at home she recommends using the time "to try new thing… [+240 chars]
